# Bull's Strength (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Adept Spells|Adept 2]], [[Bestial (Domain)|Bestial 2]], [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]], [[2nd Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 3]], [[BoXM 3rd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 3]], [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components** V, S, M/DF (a few hairs, or a pinch of dung, from a bull)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 251

The subject becomes stronger. The spell grants a +4 enhancement bonus to Strength, adding the usual benefits to melee attack rolls, melee damage rolls, and other uses of the Strength modifier.
